amendment.description: To clarify that certain consultation requirements with respect to Indian tribes remain in effect.

vote.text: Amendment SA 245 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 245 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Barrasso. (consideration: CR S536; text: CR S536) To clarify that certain consultation requirements with respect to Indian tribes remain in effect.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 245 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Barrasso.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 245 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
